description: From pertinacious +‎ -ly, from Latin pertināx, from per- (“very”) + tenāx (“tenacious”), from teneō (“I hold”).

adverbs.description: pertinaciously (comparative more pertinaciously, superlative most pertinaciously)

entries.meaning: In a stubbornly resolute manner; tenaciously holding one's opinion or course of action.
